short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download images from any web page easily

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to download images from any web page in differents sizes and formats such as jpg, jpeg, svg and png. When you open it, it will show the image and the sizes according to the image, you just have to hover the image and click on it to download it.
